name: Follow the Truth
description:
Team: Nibiru Games

Crowdforge team link: https://crowdforge.io/jams/cgj/teams/4041/dashboard

This game will let you play as Elijah, a liar exiled from his own town.

Elijah, now, has only one objective, discover new lands to live a free life, to achieve that he needs the help of a mysterious man, Noah.

Noah, in exchange, wants a very rare item.  Will you help Elijah find this mystic item?
